title: Collabarative Scheduling
description: A modern When2Meet clone for collaborative scheduling, featuring real-time updates, encrypted user login, interactive availability grids, heatmaps, and best-time suggestions. Built with a secure full-stack architecture, MySQL persistence, and deployed via Docker on Google Cloud.

title: VaultChat
description: A secure full-stack web app built with Flask, Socket.IO, and SQLite, featuring encrypted login with Scrypt, session-based access control, and a real-time WebSocket group chat with live notifications and role-based styling. The responsive frontend uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Developed in a Docker environment, it demonstrates secure, asynchronous web development.

title: BoxedSparty
description: Designed and animated custom machines in C++ using object-oriented design and graphical composition. Created multiple machines integrated into a larger system, culminating in a creative 30-second animated movie. The project highlights design, animation, and storytelling through teamwork.
